.. _apptainer_oci_pause:

apptainer oci pause
-------------------

Suspends all processes inside the container (root user only)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  Pause will suspend all processes for the specified container ID.

::

  apptainer oci pause <container_ID>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer oci pause mycontainer

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for pause

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer oci <apptainer_oci>` 	 - Manage OCI containers
